name: v2 Repeat Pattern
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0335 ( Repeat Pattern)

concept.display: twice a day at institution-specified times

designation.value: twee maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: service is provided continuously between start time and stop time

designation.value: service wordt continu geleverd tussen starttijd en stoptijd

extension.valueString: (e.g. between this meal and the next, between dinner and sleep
This is also the default when this component is null.
(e.g. PRNQ6H); given as needed over the frequency period.

concept.display: where xxx is some frequency code

designation.value: waarbij xxx een of andere frequentiecode is

extension.valueString: From the French jour (day). If <integer> is missing, the repeat rate is assumed to be 1. Day numbers are counted from 1=Monday to 7=Sunday. So Q2J2 means every second Tuesday; Q1J6 means every Saturday.

concept.display: repeats on a particular day of the week,

designation.value: herhaalt op een bepaalde dag in de week.

concept.display: in the morning at institution-specified time

designation.value: in de morgen op vastgestelde tijd

concept.display: every day before the hour of sleep

designation.value: elke dag voor het slapen gaan

concept.display: four times a day at institution-specified times

designation.value: vier maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: in the evening at institution-specified time

designation.value: in de avond op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: during each of three eight-hour shifts at institution-specified times

designation.value: tijdens elke van de drie achtuursdiensten op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: three times a day at institution-specified times

designation.value: drie maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden

concept.display: for future use, where <spec> is an interval specification as defined by the UNIX cron specification.

designation.value: voor toekomstig gebruik, waarbij <spec> een intervalspecificatie is zoals gedefinieerd door de UNIX cron specificatie.

extension.valueString: (e.g. 5ID=five times per day; 8ID=8 times per day)

concept.display: "X" times per day at institution-specified times, where X is a numeral 5 or greater.

designation.value: "X" maal per dag op vastgestelde tijden waarbij X een getal van 5 of hoger is.
